short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple chrome extension that can automatically look up words.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension designed to be a simpler alternative to most dictionaries. It is fast and simple and returns a list of definitions, uasages, and a pronounciation. The UI has no destractions and is super easy to read. To use just highlight a word and click the extension's icon.
